DOC.HEADLINE: JUST THE FACTS
DOC.TEXT: Australia and New Zealand Tourism Offices Australian Tourist Commission 2121 Avenue of the Stars , Suite 1200 Los Angeles , Calif . 90067 Tel : ( 310 ) 552-1988 Fax : ( 310 ) 552-1215 * Tourism New South Wales 2121 Avenue of the Stars Los Angeles , Calif . 90067 Tel : ( 310 ) 552-9566 Fax : ( 310 ) 277-2263 * South Australian Tourism Commission c / o Australian Travel Headquarters 1700 East Dyer Road , Suite 160 Santa Ana , Calif . 92705 Tel : ( 714 ) 852-2270 Fax : ( 714 ) 852-2277 * Tourism Victoria 2121 Avenue of the Stars , Suite 1200 Los Angeles , Calif . 90067 Tel : ( 310 ) 552-5344 Fax : ( 310 ) 552-1215 * Queensland Tourist & Travel Corp . 1800 Century Park East Suite 330 Los Angeles , Calif . 90067 Tel : ( 310 ) 788-0997 Fax : ( 310 ) 788-0128 * Northern_Territory Tourism Commission c / o Myriad Communications 5855 Green Valley Circle , Suite 204 Culver City , Calif . 90230 Tel : ( 310 ) 645-9875 Fax : ( 310 ) 645-9876 * New Zealand Tourism Board 501 Santa Monica Blvd. , Suite 300 Santa Monica , Calif . 90401 Tel : ( 800 ) 388-5494 Fax : ( 310 ) 395-5453
